mapper.insert: INSERT INTO g_info (gi_id, gi_title, gi_platform, gi_genre, gi_release, gi_age, gi_production, gi_picture, gi_site_url, gi_score) VALUES(0, #{title}, #{platform}, #{genre}, #{release}, #{age}, #{production}, #{picture}, #{siteUrl}, #{score} )
mapper.update: UPDATE g_info SET gi_title = #{title}, gi_platform = #{platform}, gi_genre = #{genre}, gi_release = #{release}, gi_age = #{age}, gi_production = #{production}, gi_picture = #{picture}, gi_site_url = #{siteUrl}, gi_score = #{score} WHERE gi_id = #{giId}
mapper.select: SELECT giId, title, platform, genre, release, age, production, picture, siteUrl, score FROM g_info WHERE 1=1 AND gi_id = #{giId} AND gi_title = #{title}
